title: WGU-App
description: a personal project developed for Western Governors University coursework..

title: Pomodoro App
description: A modern Pomodoro timer built with Python and Tkinter. Track your work and break sessions efficiently with a customizable timer and notifications.

title: CreatorVerse App
description: CreatorVerse is a React app where you can discover, organize, and manage your favorite content creators. From Twitch streamers to YouTube channels or TikTok stars, CreatorVerse lets you add, view, edit, and delete creators with ease. The app uses Supabase as the backend database and supports full CRUD functionality.
